text:
@markknoller @realDonaldTrump It’s Memorial Day weekend. The day we honor those lost to war

#coronavirus outbreak isn’t a war

 The lives lost to the virus though tragic wasn’t necessary bit not a war effort

Don’t normalize the statement around lowering the flag

#BeBetter
